name: Dennis Ritchie
details: Dennis Ritchie was an American computer scientist who created the C programming language and co-developed the Unix operating system.

name: Guido van Rossum
details: Guido van Rossum is a Dutch programmer known as the creator of the Python programming language.

name: James Gosling
details: James Gosling is a Canadian computer scientist best known as the creator of the Java programming language.

name: Linus Torvalds
details: Linus Torvalds is a Finnish-American software engineer who created the Linux kernel.

name: Ken Thompson
details: Ken Thompson is an American computer scientist who co-created Unix and later co-developed the Go programming language.

name: Brendan Eich
details: Brendan Eich is an American programmer who created JavaScript in just 10 days while working at Netscape.

name: Bjarne Stroustrup
details: Bjarne Stroustrup is a Danish computer scientist who created the C++ programming language.

name: Yukihiro Matsumoto
details: Yukihiro Matsumoto, also known as Matz, is a Japanese computer scientist who designed the Ruby programming language.

name: Anders Hejlsberg
details: Anders Hejlsberg is a Danish software engineer known for creating Turbo Pascal, C#, and co-developing TypeScript.

name: Larry Wall
details: Larry Wall is an American programmer and linguist known for creating the Perl programming language.
